name: Alabama Girl
text: I love my hair. Haven’t had hair in years!!!no more hats!!!

name: Timothy Stansbury
text: Great prices, Awesome Service, Very Professional, I Recommend to anyone looking for good Hair Replacement service, Tim

name: Jamal Windham
text: Best barber in the United States!

name: Walter Brown
text: Good shop to get a haircut

name: Quincy Winston
text: Great barber, even better person! Love what he’s doing with the toupees

name: Arlene Pettaway
text: Marlon is the best. He has been cutting our Dad's hair for a minute. When Dad was sick, Marlon came to the house and kept that cut fresh!!!

name: Redd 2xx
text: He is awesome mr marlon is a great barber

name: Machelle Chandler
text: Marlon gave me a great pixie haircut!  I felt like I was in the movie Barbershop.  I’ll be back for another great cut.

resp.text: Thank you! We really appreciate your business. Come back and see us again.

name: Walter Edwards
text: I really enjoy going there some real brothers work there. I have some of the most profound conversation there than any other place I visit besides church

name: Linda Lewis
text: Marvin is a great barber and owner.  He makes everyone feel welcome and appreciated

name: Antonio Holly
text: Great place to get a hair cut.

name: Mack Dunklin
text: Barbers will give you a perfect cut you're in & Out quick thumbs up! !!!!

name: Blaze DaGreat
text: Nice people good barbers

name: Philomenia Klopner
text: Great barbers, friendly and goof prices.

name: Audrey Dyal
text: Great cut, great price

name: ty Montgomery
text: I always go there

name: Frederick Boykin
text: The best barber in Mobile

name: The Dime
text: One of the best shops in Mobile

name: Lori Hammack
text: These people are absolutely amazing- I recently found out that I have breast cancer- Dr Beckenstein and his staff,  not only made me feel at ease, they showed it as well..  I truly feel more at ease and I know these wonderful “friends” have me and will take care of me.  Simply a wonderful experience and such great people all around..

name: Nichole Cochran
text: Always a great experience. The staff is super friendly and the doctor listens and doesn’t rush his patients. I’ve always felt heard and cared for during my visits. I always leave with my questions answered.

name: Robert Etheredge
text: Dr. B and his staff are the best.  They are committed to excellent service and results and it's evident in everything that they do.  I could not be happier with my experience in their care.

name: Eliot Stegall
text: I cannot say enough good things about Dr. Beckenstein and his staff. I became a patient of his mid 2018. I’ve never had anything less than a great experience every time I called or visited the office. I am a transman and have undergone top surgery performed by Dr. B. He did a great job, and the entire staff has always been very supportive as well as warm and welcoming. Dr. B is a talented surgeon who is knowledgeable, friendly, thorough, and highly accomplished. His staff is equally friendly, thorough, and very accommodating. I must give a special mention to Janet, as she has been an absolute delight, and she is wonderful with the many responsibilities she carries. I have and will continue to refer others to Dr. Beckenstein!

name: Michelle Jones
text: The team is professional and personable. Dr. Beckenstein’s skill and commitment to accuracy is much respected and appreciated.

name: Linda Southern
text: Incredible staff. Dr. Beckenstein is a wonderful doctor. They deserve 10 stars!

name: Carolyn Tidwell
text: Love this place! Everyone there is so sweet and nice. They always make you comfortable. Only thing is I wish the Dr would take a little more time with you. Cause I get in a hurry to try to think of my questions and I forget them. He is a very caring, compassionate and thorough Dr. Dr Beckenstein does great work and and the staff is wonderful and  highly recommend him.

name: Kimberly Davis
text: Love Dr Beckenstein and all the Ladies that work there, they go above and beyond to make sure your treated like Family.  I couldn’t ask for a Better Doctor while going thru this journey of Breast Cancer.

name: Kendall Early
text: Dr. Beckenstein did my breast reduction and from the first consultation I felt like I was in good hands. His staff is excellent and made me feel totally comfortable moving forward with the surgery. I am THRILLED with my results. It’s even better than I hoped, truly life changing. Recovery was smooth with no complications. I would recommend him 100x over!

name: Erica Scott
text: My experience from beginning to end was exceptional! The entire staff is truly one of a kind!

name: Crystal Perry
text: Dr. Beckenstein and his staff are super friendly and very attentive. I had a million questions about my surgery and he answered them all with a smile.

name: Karissa Witcher
text: Love the atmosphere and Dr. Beckenstein is straight forward and answered all of my questions!!

name: Amy Carpenter
text: I highly recommend this doctor and his staff. My surgical results are beautiful. I have always been treated wonderfully by them and look forward to working with them again in the future.

name: Vikki Forte
text: Absolutely love everyone from the moment of check-in and upon checking out,everyone has a pleasant personality and very patient and knowledgeable of services rendered. I have gone through a lot over the past 3 months and I am eternally grateful for everyone in this office that for being understanding and compassionate. ❤️

name: mattie abbott
text: I have been very happy with the way everyone treated me while under the care of Dr. Beckenstein. EVERYONE there was , is, and will always treat you with respect and understanding. I will always recommend them to anyone and everyone.

name: Lori Jimerson
text: I underwent a breast reduction and I am well pleased with my results.  Dr. Beckenstein and his staff are great.  He’s very kind, compassionate, and caring, his staff is wonderful as well.  They are very nice and efficient.  Your completely prepared with everything you need before you ever have your procedure.  They call you back quickly if you need anything.  I would definitely use him again.

name: Holly Drew Shafer
text:
I originally had my double mastectomy with another surgeon and didn’t have much help at all with aftercare or support when I found out I’d need Lat Flap reconstruction after after radiation.
My experience with Dr Bekenstein and his staff has been completely different, from the office staff to all of medical team. Overall wonderful experience ! If you need breast reconstruction this is the place to be. Not to mention my results are better than expected.

name: Danielle Martin
text: Dr. Beckenstein has a really positive attitude and bedside manner. He is very thorough and takes his time to discuss what he will do in great detail. I am happy with my results and will definitely recommend him to other friends of mine. On a personal note, he seems to be well respected by his peers at St. Vincent's hospital and they all had wonderful things to say about him. I felt truly blessed to have him as my doctor!

name: Lori Jenkins
text: Everyone at Dr. Beckenstein's practice  (Dr. B, nurses, techs, coordinators, scheduler, etc.) is always so nice, caring and quick to respond to any and all questions I may have.  Their service is exemplary in my opinion.  I would recommend him and his practice to anyone.

name: Jennifer Giddens
text: I had a breast reduction in March.  I have been very happy with my results.  I feel that for a long time I was very self-conscious due to my large chest.  I would wear large shirts that looked like a potato sack on my because if I wore a medium, I felt like I was squeezed into.  Since my breast reduction, I have gone down to a small.  I have also quit biting my nails.  Not that it correlates, but my self confidence is greatly improved.  Dr. Beckenstein and his staff are wonderful, caring.  I could not have asked for a better team caring for me.

name: sherania mcdonald murray
text: Dr. Beckenstein was knowledgeable and experienced. He was very detailed on what to expect.

name: Jnette Steward
text: He was very personable, understanding, and professional. Before breast reduction I’d never like the way I look, but he gave me confidence. It’s been a year already!! A big thank you to Dr. Beckinstein and his staff. Highly recommended!!

name: chaquaya wilson-tarver
text: Dr. Beckenstein answered all my questions without me asking. He made me feel very comfortable during my consult. The vibe I got from him is that, he made feel like my safety is his top concern.

name: Vikki Forte
text: Very good experience, warm caring environment. All staff was very friendly and knowledgeable, I am feeling at ease about the road ahead. Hats off to you all for making appointment # 1 a great one.

name: Monica Hopkins
text: Dr. Beckenstein and his Staff are the BEST!!!

name: Shana Roper
text: The entire office is amazing and works diligently with you and the doctor. Each visit has been pleasant, quick, and to the point. Not only is he a people's person so is his staff and they are very professional. Dr. Beckenstein is easy to talk to and even if he may think you are saying or asking for something far fetched...lol... he'll never show it. He just says let's see if we can do it.

name: Victoria Penton
text: I cannot express how wonderful my experience has been with Dr. Beckenstein! He, along with his staff, have been exceptional throughout my entire process. They are there to answer any questions that I have, and they really know that they are doing. I am super happy with my surgical results as well. It is better than I could have ever expected. He truly cares about his patients, and works to ensure that he does things right the first time around for his patients. I cannot thank him enough for what he has done for me!

name: Michelle Copeland
text: This entire staff is fantastic and you cant find anyone better than Dr. Beckenstein!!! He is outstanding! They are all like family to me!!! He makes you feel like you are in excellent hands! He goes beyond just being a great doctor! He gets  to know YOU and listens!

name: Stephanie Nix
text: I had a great experience with the staff . Dr.Beckenstein has a great and wonderful rapport with his patients , I love how they cared about me and my Breast , Dr. Beckenstein a wonderful Doctor and I just want to thank him and his staff.

name: Monica Scaturro
text: My entire experience with Dr. Beckenstein’s office was wonderful. Their office staff was more than helpful and friendly. Dr. Beckenstein is knowledgeable, professional, and personable. He makes you feel very comfortable with his compassionate bedside manner.

name: Erma mhinton0787@bellsouth.net
text: I cannot say enough about Dr. Beckenstein, he is superb!  Waiting room and examining rooms offer a great first impression: they are clean, colorful, and quite tastefully decorated.  Nurses and staff greet everyone with warmth and gives Hershey chocolate or peppermint before you leave.  Wait time is brief.  Dr. B walks in with a genuine smile.  He really listens to the patient. He laughs easily which has a calming effect particularly on someone who is nervous about invasive procedures. His skills as a surgeon are top notch. He respects your time by getting the patient in and out quickly.  I am truly impressed by this surgeon.

name: tanyeka grant
text: Dr. Beckenstein and his staff are the most caring and knowledgeable people I have ever met. They were willing to walk you through the process step by step and always very professional. I will gladly recommend their services to everyone!

name: Shay Lee
text: The atmosphere in the office was great, the staff was friendly, and Dr. Beckenstein was so personable. It's very rare you find a doctor who cares about their patients.

name: Felicia Ryals Williams
text: Since June 2016 I have been a patient of Dr Beckenstien’s. In that time I have been treated as if I’m the only patient. The staff always answer question immediately. They care and are compassionate about your concerns. And are always available if needed. Not to mention that he is the BEST surgeon! I have been so happy with my results after  my bi-lateral mastectomy with reconstruction. Thank you Dr B💕

name: Lori Munson
text: Dr Beckenstein is fabulous! His bedside manner is phenomenal. He explains everything and makes sure you understand. His staff is friendly, polite, supportive, sincere, and compassionate. My surgery was perfect!! I could not be happier with my results or my choice of doctor.

name: Teresa Hart
text: Dr. B and his entire staff are compassionate, caring people who are helping me through an extremely difficult situation. I am amazed at what they have been able to do for me, don't know what I would do without them. I Thank all of you !♥

name: Amy Brasher
text: Dr Beckenstein and his staff are super nice and attentive to their patient’s needs. I highly recommend them.

name: Johnny Franklin
text: My wife had Dr Beckenstein for her reconstruction surgery.   Dr Beckenstein is a wonderful, compassionate, and he did a wonderful job of reconstructing her breast, and lifting her other breast.   We would recommend Dr Beckenstein for any one who needs any kind of plastic surgery.

name: Susan Cadieux
text: Everyone was friendly and courteous and informative

name: Julia's World
text: I wish I could give Him 1000 stars My surgery  went very well ...Dr Beckenstein is very kind and caring .his staff is very  compassionate and tentative. I would reccomend his practice  for your surgery Needs ....

name: Pam Cool
text: Wonderful Wonderful experience ❤.  Dr Beckenstein and staff are the best!!

name: Raetta Young
text: I have been treated with nothing but respect.  I had a reduction and never had any pain. Dr B plans ahead so you have everything you need and might need at home prior to surgery so that you can focus on getting home and healing.  Appointment was quick and easy. I highly recommend him and his staff. Thank you dr B I feel amazing

name: Candy Mahaffey
text: My experience was very positive. My appointment was at 3:15 and I was taken back promptly. Dr. Beckenstein came in the room promptly as well. He was very thorough and informative. The entire staff was friendly and helpful.

name: Denise Dobbs
text: Very interested in my medical history and listened to what my issues were.

name: Jill Foshee
text: Dr. Beckenstein and his staff have been outstanding in every way! He is very knowledgeable and puts you at ease. The staff has been pleasant, accommodating, and efficient. I would highly recommend this practice to anyone needing their services!

name: sally bryson
text: Dr. Beckenstein and his staff are the best!!  Dr. Beckenstein really listens to you and addresses your concerns.   He has such a positive energy  and desire to help . The whole staff are so helpful and courteous and go out of their way to make you feel comfortable and address any issues you might have.   I am so thankful to all of them for all they did to help me through my breast reconstruction after having a  double mastectomy about 7 years ago.

name: Mary E Mullins
text: I have been a patient of Dr Beckenstein for 12 years. He is the most compassionate & knowledgeable Dr I know ! I always look forward to my visit with Him & His staff. I have a cancer ministry and I always refer anyone  Breast cancer !

name: That one Vegan hater
text: I can’t express enough the compassion and comfort received by Dr. Beckenstein and his staff and how at ease Dr. Beckenstein has made me feel with his level of confidence and professionalism!

name: Amber Moon
text: I had my first consultation with Dr. Beckenstein yesterday for breast implant deflation,  removal and reduction/lift. Dr. Beckenstein and his staff were so kind, very thorough and informative, they answered all my questions and really took their time to make sure I had a great experience! I’m so glad I was recommenced to Dr. Beckenstein and I would highly recommend them to anyone!

name: kirklyn robinson
text:
DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY.
I requested for a consultation before doing my research and going through Dr. Beckenstien’s  before and after pictures once I realized that I did not want to use him anymore because of what I seen on the before and after photos I called to cancel my consultation and get my $150 deposit refunded. The lady told me it would take a week to process it and a week to get my check. No big deal, well a month goes by and no check I call again to see what’s going on and they tell me they just sent the check that week! A month to send a check?? Whatever they tell me I’ll get it any day now another 2 1/2 weeks go by and no check again. I call a THIRD time to see what the hell is going on and they tell me they just send the check 2 days ago. A month and a half has gone by and they just refunded my money? And why did they lie to me 2 1/2 weeks ago when I called and said they had already sent it?! Anyways, I will probably  not be getting my money back but at least I didn’t let them botch my body up. Do not waste your money on a consultation because the minute you feel uncomfortable you will not be getting that money back.

name: Juanita Morgan
text: I was afraid at first but after talking with Dr Beckenstein and his staff, the felling had left me quickly truly a wonderful visit.

name: Elizabeth Milan
text: Very pleased! They explained everything, very patient, very nice staff.

name: Deb
text: Dr. Beckenstein is a caring, personable doctor who made me feel very at ease about my upcoming surgery.  Not for nothing, his staff are the most professional, friendly group I've worked with in B'ham.  Highly recommend!

name: Jean-Keaton Le Bon
text: I've had several procedures with Dr. Beckenstein and I could not be happier!!  His skills are the best and his staff is awesome !!!  I recommend him to anyone who has needs of his services.  He has many testimonials throughout his office that shows his kindness and humanitarian qualities. He's truly a doctor that cares about you.

name: Michelle Rice
text: Every visit I’ve ever had at Dr. Beckensteins office has been just wonderful. From my very first visit he and his staff made me feel very comfortable with what I was going through. Dr. Beckenstein called me at home to check on me after my double masectomy with reconstruction and that really means a lot. From the office personnel to the nursing staff and finally Dr. Beckenstein they are all top notch in their profession. When I have friends ask questions and inquire about my doctors I have used during this past year I always begin by telling them how wonderful Dr. B is. Thank y’all so much for all you have done for me. I’ll see y’all soon!

name: Page Robertson
text: Excellent care and always right on time!

name: Melanie Sanders
text: I am incredibly grateful for Dr. Michael Beckenstein and his staff. They have treated me with compassion and expert care. I am a breast cancer survivor and I had a bilateral mastectomy. Dr. Beckenstein performed my reconstruction procedure. He has attended to my every need and has informed me of every stage of my process. I highly recommend Dr. Michael Beckenstein! He is highly skilled and a wonderful, compassionate soul!

name: Leah Mena
text: Dr. Beckenstein is Birmingham's best plastic surgeon as well as a highly respected, wonderful man.

name: Amelia Fielder
text: Dr. Michael Beckenstein is one the best Cosmetic Surgeons in the business.  Both he and his team are awesome !!! I've had a couple of procedures done by him and has been nothing less than pleased. He is professional , skilled  and courteous, always ready to answer any questions or concerns you may have even after your surgery. I could not have imagined my experience with him and his team more satisfying, I would recommend him to anyone interested in any type cosmetic surgery.

name: BETH POOL
text: I really like the welcome and care that I received at Dr. Beckenstein's office!

name: genger ferrell
text: Fantastic!!!  I planned my reduction for two years and finally on Jan. 24, 2019 it happened.  Best experience ever!!  From start to finish Dr. B the staff and everyone involved were perfect!  If you have have considered having a procedure I can recommend Dr. Beckenstein withoug reservation.  The best experience in a medical office I have ever had!!

name: Amber Martin
text: Dr Beckenstein preformed a tummy tuck and left breast fat transfer on me and I have never felt better in my life. I look good and have confidence again that I haven't had since I was in my teens and early 20's. He and his staff were so kind and caring. They answered all my questions helped me to feel comfortable about everything that was going to take place. I never had to worry about anything. They even provided me with post surgery scar care instructions and medicine. They were with me to entire journey. I just went for my 2 month check up and everything is looking great better than I even imagined. If you're thinking about getting something done don't do anything until you've seen Dr Beckenstein he's the absolute best there is!!!

name: Tina McDaniel
text: I had breast reduction surgery last November. Dr B and his staff could not have been better.   This truly has improved my life. Back pain is better, exercise is easier and my breathing has improved.

name: Cha K
text: From Huntsville, Al & Dr. Beckenstein performed a bilateral breast reduction. I chose this doctor because he was 1. Board certified 2. His reviews were phenomenal (so I had to at least give him a shot right). During my consultation he already knew what issues that came with my size & he was respectful about it. Dr. Beckenstein’s staff is patient, knowledgeable & efficient. I saw from other surgeons in the area that staff wasn’t as respectful & the wait time was long. Definitely not the case here. Every last person @ this office plays an important role in making everything run smoothly & I couldn’t have asked for more. I made the best choice. If you are looking @ this review & haven’t scheduled your consultation I advise you to do so immediately, like now, as soon as they open @ 8:30. Also my girls look like a work of art!!!!!!!!!

name: Latosha Taylor
text: I am a medical profession and customer service as well as patient care really is a big deal to me. I spoke with Tianna at Dr. Beckenstein over the phone regarding a procedure and she was very prompt, knowledgeable and courteous. Speaking to a medical profession that is patient and cares let me know that myself and my patients are in good hands. This office truly rocks in my book. Thank you Dr. Beckenstein. Your staff is amazing

name: Robbin Stewart
text: I was diagnosed with cancer in one breast but elected to have a double mastectomy.  Dr. B is a perfectionist and believe me when I say that is a good thing.  He was able to save my nipples and honestly if you did not know that I had the surgery done, you would not be able to tell by looking.  The scaring is very minimal.  I did not want to go "big"  and Dr. B and his staff were very mindful of my wishes even though they tried to talk me into DD's.  I could not have asked for a nicer, more attentive doctor and staff.

name: Lou Ann Cornelius
text: What a wonderful doctor and staff!  During a cancer diagnosis, a double mastectomy and three reconstructive surgeries, I was a "regular" in this office.  So happy now to be through these deep waters, I will truly miss visiting with these special people!

name: Mary Roberts
text: Dr Beckenstein and his staff are wonderful.  I am so grateful I found him ❤️

name: Stewie2Space
text:
Dr. Beckenstein is an amazing surgeon. He cares immensely about his patients, their comfort, and their results. I just went in for a PRP treatment, which was nearly painless. Before that, he made sure I had a hair analysis done so we could monitor progress properly.

I would never choose another surgeon to do this job again, and I thank him and his staff for their wonderful support.

name: Johnny Ferrell
text: Welcoming, careing , attentive.  Made me feel at home and at ease.  The best medical experience I have ever received hands down.  I will tell my referring physician and my friends!

name: Ivery Bragg
text: I have nothing bad to say. his staff is very respectful and try their best to get back with you as soon as possible. Dr. Beck wasn't anything but helpful

name: Kim Marvin
text: Dr. Beckenstein and his entire staff are miracle workers!  2 1/2 weeks before a scheduled abdominal hysterectomy, the thought came to me: why am I not having an abdominoplasty at the same time?  I filled out the consult request form, and Dr. Beckenstein replied within hours... he told me later he was at the Iron Bowl when he got my request!  Monday, his staff fit me in when it was discovered that Dr. Beckenstein was available and my pre-scheduled surgical time also worked for him!   His staff went above and beyond to help manage this financially for me as well. I’m now 12 days post surgery, and I can not believe the changes in my body. I feel better every day and am so grateful to Dr. Beckenstein and his wonderful team for making my Christmas miracle happen!

name: Rebecca Poskey
text: Dr Beckinstein did a fabulous job getting rid of adhesions where I’d had breast reconstruction by another dr after breast cancer. It was better than I could have hoped for.

name: Shelli Walker
text: Dr Beckensrein was a God-send for me. I had several breast surgeries that ended badly but he patiently worked with me and made an huge improvement. He was wonderful to my sister as well. I need to go see him again soon'

name: M
text: Love Dr. B and his staff! They are very informative and compassionate. I highly recommend Dr. B!

name: Elizabeth Cox
text: The care and service that Dr. Beckenstein and his staff provide are unmatched. They provide you with an enormous amount of information to educate you fully prior to surgery and are always available to answer questions. Dr. Beckenstein personally visited to check on me after surgery and I couldn't be pleased more with my results. I recommend him daily and wouldn't trust my care in the hands of any other provider. He is an expert that listens to EVERY detail, want, and concern!

name: Nyla Lucky
text: Dr. Beckenstein and his staff are amazing, they make you feel like you are apart of their family. My experience has been nothing but the best! I highly recommend Dr. Beckenstein!

name: Krista William
text: Dr. Beckenstein and his staff are above and beyond the standard of care. From the very moment you enter the office you are put at ease. They are always looking out for the patients best interest. With the most updated technology and services available. Dr. Beckenstein is very compassionate always giving his patients the best advise for the best outcome. His staff is also always there to assist. I highly recommend Dr. Beckenstein if you are considering any procedure  such as breast augmentation, reconstruction, Botox, facial fillers whatever the case may be. Please only consider consulting the best call Dr. Beckenstein and be amazed by what he can do for you.

name: Kim Bible
text: I trust Dr. Beckenstein 100%.  He and his staff are all very professional.  He listens to you.  He is considerate of your feelings.  I had breast reduction and was not disappointed in the results.  Also, I use other services such as botox, juvederm and restalyn.  I couldn't be more pleased with all of the services I have used.  I recommend Dr. Beckenstein to all of my friends who ask me for referrals.

name: Charmonika Smith
text: I received a consultation for a breast reduction. I was told that I was a very good candidate for a breast reduction. I gave them all of my information to submit to my insurance to later find out my information was never submitted. I later call back to see if it was submitted and I was given the run around to later receive a phone call to say that they knew what they were doing and they submit claims all the time. Here it is 8 months later and I still haven't received a phone call only a bill in the mail.

name: Ashlyn Sunseri
text: Dr. Beckenstein is not only the best plastic surgeon in Alabama, but an amazing person. I drive from Asheville, NC to see Dr. Beckenstein because I refuse to see anyone else! His staff is incredible and so caring. Thank you for your amazing service!!

name: Sherry Short
text: Dr. Beckenstein and his staff are so caring and supportive. From the moment I met Dr. Beckenstein I felt comfortable and knew I had chosen the right physician. He is an amazing person and Birmingham is blessed to have him!!

name: M Gray
text:
I have nothing but wonderful and positive things to say about my experience with Dr. Beckenstein and his awesome team!!

Whenever I have had to call in with questions the receptionist is always very cordial and connects me with the right person and information.

Dr. Beckenstein and his team values your time; my appointments have been very prompt and efficient and I know that when I schedule my appointments I am not wasting valuable time sitting in the waiting room well beyond my appointment time.  My husband has also taken notice of this and has been very impressed.

For starters, aside from the wonderful efficiency at each appointment, the initial consult was extremely impressive!! Dr. Beckenstein uses modern technology to help in determining the potential outcome of a breath augmentation.  After having two kids, and pumping for a year with both I was not happy with the way my breast looked.  I wanted them to be filled out again and not rely on bras to give me the look that I wanted.  I did not want an obviously augmented look and Dr. Beckenstein listened to my concerns and he delivered beautiful results!! I am one month and three days post surgery and I couldn't be happier with my results!!  Also, the follow up and post op appointments have been great as well!!

I highly recommend Dr. Beckenstein to anyone who desires a breast augmentation!

name: Jane Winters
text:
When you first hear the word "Breast Cancer" you start to panic and then go into shock! You are scared about all the procedures that you must endure to be whole once again. When I decided to have a double mastectomy I knew I wanted the best plastic surgeon in Birmingham. I prayed that the Lord would send me to a doctor that would not only be the best surgeon but also compassionate. I found this in Dr. Beckenstein!! From the moment I walked in the office with my husband and I knew this was where I needed to be. The waiting room was soothing and calm to all that entered.Everyone that I came in contact with was always so helpful and friendly.
After my consultation with Dr. Beckenstein I felt not only encouraged but knew if I had any concerns or problems he would be always be there for me! As I am now  finishing up the reconstruction process I feel that I could have not been more pleased with the outcome.It is wonderful to feel whole once again!!  Dr. Beckenstein has made this possible. He is an amazing and compassionate doctor that goes over and beyond what is expected. I highly recommend him to anyone that is anticipating breast reconstruction or any other related procedures.

name: Suzanne Blocker
text: Dr Beckenstein and his staff are caring, thorough and provide excellent care.  I recommend him without reservation

name: Tonya Whittington
text:
I must share my experience with all.   Nine years ago I had breast cancer and Dr. Beckenstein was the doctor that took care of my breast reconstruction with implants.

Now, to the present day.  Three months ago I was again diagnosed with recurrent breast cancer.   I have been seen by numerous doctors from The Woman's Imaging in Denver Colorado, Slaon Kettering in New York and Johns Hopkins in Washington DC.   Every single doctor and nurse that has seen my breasts are shocked and in total surprise to see how beautiful they look and always comment on the quality of work. Every doctor has asked me who my plastic surgeon was and I am so proud to utter the name Dr. Beckenstein.   I was very happy after my surgery nine years ago but to have others comment and see the expression on their faces nine years later just makes me so happy.  Now I am quite sad the a surgeon in DC will be ruining the works of Dr Beckenstein. I wish doctor Beckenstein could be my doctor once again but asking him to fly to D.C. Is asking a little much.   In short, he is by far the best plastic surgeon you will ever encounter and for those that live in Birmingham-- you are blessed.

Thank you Dr. Beckenstein!!
Tonya Whittington

name: Amiee Reeves
text: Our story may be a little different from others but it's an important story in knowing why to choose Dr. Michael Beckenstein.  There was a little girl across the ocean that had been badly burned as a toddler.  As she grew, so did the scars.  Our prayer was to find a doctor that would be willing to help us help her.  My husband called Dr. Beckenstein and began to tell him of this child in need on the other side of the world and before my husband could finish the story, Dr. B said, "I'll do it...no problem."  Dr. Beckenstein committed to help our family give this child something that I thought may be impossible.  He has gone beyond just being her surgeon...  He has shown us kindness beyond anything I could have imagined.  There is no one that I would trust more.  We have had approximately 14 surgeries and we have gone weekly into his office for the past 5 years.  After each surgery, the scars are being erased and I'm humbled by the gift (his surgical ability) that God has given this man.  And then, there's  his team...oh my his team...they are just like him.  Committed, professional and the kindest people I have ever met.  They are a reflection of him.  I cannot imagine going through this without Dr. Beckenstein and his entire team.  They have been an answered prayer for me and my family and have given our daughter something she never believed could happen.  We are forever grateful to Dr. Beckenstein.  5 stars is not enough for this review. :)

name: Jackie Whisenhunt
text:
This has been an absolute LIFE CHANGING experience for me.  This surgery was the best decision I have made since I had my children.  Dr. Beckenstein, and his very knowledgeable, friendly, understanding, kind staff are more than just professionals in their line of work.  They have made me feel like I've always been a part of their FAMILY.  Not just another patient.  So I have a very special thanks that goes out to all of the ladies that I have seen and that have worked with me before and after my surgery.  Dana, Genger, Bo, Sahvanna, Mandy, and also to Dr. Beckenstein.  These wonderful people have helped me make such a difference in my life, their is nothing that I will ever be able to do or say to show them just how thankful I truly am.  These are definitely the people that I would recommend to anyone.  I know they will be happy that they chose you all.  I know I'm glad I did.  I would do it again.
Jackie Riley

name: Nancy Miles
text: I was so scared when I was diagnosed with breast cancer in June of this year.Dr. Beckenstein and  his staff have been so kind and caring and have been available both day and night. When  you are dealing  with an illness of this magnitude both physically and mentally  this  has meant more than I can adeguately express in this short review. I am now way down the road to recovery and my husband and I could not be more pleased with the results. I feel and even look better than I have in many years. Dr. Beckenstein is a fantastic surgeon and he has surrounded himself, as well,  with a caring and knowlegeable staff. When he tells you he will answer your emails by the next morning,he means it! And when you call his office, you talk to a person and not a machine and that is very reassuring.His skill as a surgeon and his compassion as a person has made all the difference in my recovery. Thanks you guys,you are the best!

name: Holly Stiles
text: My experience with Dr. Beckenstein, his office staff and nurses has been nothing less than great! Scheduling appointments, pre-surgical markings, surgery and post op care has been extremely easy and efficient. I have and will continue to recommend Dr. Beckenstein to my friends looking for a surgeon to perform cosmetic procedures. Dr. Beckenstein's approach is one that I like in that the cosmetic procedures chosen have led people to ask if I've lost weight, worked out more, gotten a hair cut, etc. It's been obvious that something has physically changed but not so obvious that they can pinpoint the procedures performed. This is important to me as I wanted a discrete change, I did not want broadcast to everyone what I was having done! My friends have chosen Dr. Beckenstein to perform their cosmetic procedures and have been as pleased as I have. We all rave about the care we received, the support and honesty that the staff offers as well as the quick access to Dr. Beckenstein and his staff-- calls and questions are answered or returned quickly. Dr. Beckenstein has a great bedside manner and the post op follow up calls to check on his patient(s) are much appreciated!

name: Erica Owens
text: Terrible breast reduction procedure experience. Breasts are still large, nipples deformed, incision scars extended, left breast lower, and back pain still exist.

name: Lo Lo
text: I so love Dr. Beckenstein and his staff!

name: Peyton Howell
text: I have never felt more comfortable and treated so well at any other facility

name: Elizabeth Tanner
text: Amazing!

name: valencia hall
text: The staff is awful and he has 0 bed size services!!!!

name: Daija Taylor
text: I got a silk press! Love everything about it and the salon is beautiful! I will return!

name: DAB3
text: Mrs. Edwards is a personable professional. Every time I go she is always in a good mood. She is very knowledgeable about hair maintainance and things that effect hair health. I can leave her shop ready for work or a night out. My hair is always on point!

name: Jennifer swain
text: Very professional and uplifting environment. Every time I have had an idea of a hairstyle she has always brought it to life. I have gotten a couple of wigs made and every time I have worn them I have gotten nothing but compliments on my hair. If you are looking for a private salon due to hair loss or just your preference I recommend Salon Wygs.

name: Crystal Robinson
text: This was my first time getting my hair done at this salon....I love my hair and the owner is great! If you are looking for quality stylist that has a lot of knowledge about hair, this is the place to go. I appreciated her fitting me in at the last minute and her kindness. I will be returning! I have gotten so many compliments on my hair.... thank you KI.

name: LaToya Brown
text: If you are indecisive like me, Ki is your go to person. I NEVER know what I want but when I leave her chair, I got everything I need.  Heaven sent.

name: Wynette Mcwilliams
text: As noted, it was a  Great experience with a great person, but my only issue was the communication on the website. It noted that I should be there an hour  and that the price was $75-$85. The price I pay was almost double the amount on the website. Unfortunately that was a drawback. I am definitely looking for a permanent salon home, but  I am looking for affordable quick  weaves.  Since you get what you pay for, I will have to take that into consideration!

name: MarkMy Words
text: Last minute cast needs were taken care of promptly and professionally. Thanks Salon Wygs! Everyone looked amazing!

name: Tee W
text: Love going to Ki.  She's very good at what she does.   I always leave pleased with my style!
